mdRecord.dcterms:title: Burks Fork Church of the Brethren (Methodist)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A series of three photographs of the church building exterior and interior. In 1946, the larger New Constitution United Brethren church merged with the Evangelical Association to form the Evangelical United Brethren Church. That body in turn merged with The Methodist Church (USA) in 1968 to form the United Methodist Church.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Methodist Church
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
